name: Battle Record: Graizor
description:
FEATURES

  • Action Combat with 2 weapons
  • Challenging Bosses
  • 5 Unique Levels

GAMEPLAY

Battle Record: Graizor is an action game with an emphasize on planning and pacing your movement. You have a sword and an energy rifle equipped and will need to think carefully about which weapon is right for any situation.

STORY

After centuries of hostility between the nations of Altera and Pizon, the 2 nations are finally going to sign a peace treaty. However, before the treaty could be signed, a nefarious plot to sabotage the treaty will lead to the most destructive war the world has ever seen. As the war drags on, a rebel army develops an advanced mobile weapon in secret that might be the worlds only hope to avoid complete annihilation. In a final fight for the fate of the planet, they will take to the front lines with there new weapon, GRAIZOR!
